summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the purchase of Block 302, Seattle Tide Lands, and specifying the terms and conditions thereof; authorizing the conveyance of a portion of Block 385 Seattle Tidelands, and vacated streets adjoining; making an appropriation from the Light Fund to the Municipal Light Extension Bond 1923 Construction Fund as a temporary loan, and providing for the repayment thereof; designating a site for one of the sub- stations contemplated by Ordinance No. 38920; and repealing Section 2 of Ordinance No. 43539.
